data.body: Implement installer and launcher for a real app-like local experience. Installer must place a 'foolery' CLI on PATH and wire runtime paths needed to run Foolery without cloning or manually starting dev mode.
data.description: Implement installer and launcher for a real app-like local experience. Installer must place a 'foolery' CLI on PATH and wire runtime paths needed to run Foolery without cloning or manually starting dev mode.
data.title: Implement GitHub install script and local launcher
